name: Stan is over 40 on the date of his exam

testSteps.description: Given Stan is a 2nd class pilot
Given he was born on 1 April 1970
When he has a medical exam on 1 January 2022
Then his medical certificate will expire on 31 January 2023

userStory.storyName: Determining when a pilot is due for a medical examination
userStory.displayName: Determining when a pilot is due for a medical examination
userStory.narrative:
As a pilot
  I want to know when my medical certificate will expire
  So that I can renew my certificate at the right time and comply with FAA regulations

rule.name: Certificates for 2st class licenses expire after 12 months

steps: Given Stan is a 2nd class pilot
